ch0143_00_lambda/0101_0701_01_10:
Muhahaha, we’ve been waiting for you! So, you
are [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0143_00_lambda/0101_0701_02_10:
Hey, I’m practicing, all right? Stop staring at me
like that!
ch0143_00_lambda/7101_0701_01_10:
One of the members of the International Police is
a master of disguise, right?
ch0143_00_lambda/7101_0701_02_10:
A battle of disguises between the forces of good
and evil... If it happens, I’ll have to go all out!
ch0143_00_lambda/7102_0701_01_10:
What’s the secret to a good disguise? For starters,
you gotta observe your target and take note of
their habits!
ch0143_00_lambda/7102_0701_02_10:
I’ve been watching you carefully, so if I wanted
to, I could disguise myself as you perfectly!
ch0143_00_lambda/7102_0701_03_10:
*sigh* If only I could copy your skill at
Pokémon battling...
ch0143_00_lambda/7103_0701_01_10:
Pretending to be someone else is actually
pretty fun!
ch0143_00_lambda/7103_0701_02_10:
And there’s nothing quite like the feeling when
someone falls for it hook, line, and sinker!
ch0143_00_lambda/7104_0701_01_10:
There’s a certain Pokémon that always disguises
itself as a tree.
ch0143_00_lambda/7104_0701_02_10:
Now THAT’S real dedication! That Pokémon is my
role model—a true inspiration!
ch0143_00_lambda/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey [Name:PlayerNickname ], are you
interested in joining Team Rocket?
ch0143_00_lambda/7105_0701_02_10:
No, huh? Well, you’re no fun. And to think, I was
gonna take real good care of you as your boss!
ch0143_00_lambda/1701_0701_01_10: This is for you! Take it with gratitude!
ch0143_00_lambda/1701_0701_02_10: I am a nice guy! But you owe me one, OK?
ch0143_00_lambda/1701_0702_01_10:
By the way, I’ve got a strict “no returns” policy,
OK? Wahahaha!
ch0143_00_lambda/2501_0701_01_10:
When I look at you, I’m reminded of that kid who
came to squash Team Rocket...
ch0143_00_lambda/2501_0701_02_10:
If I pretended to be one of you kids, do you think
I’d get a lot stronger?!
ch0143_00_lambda/2501_0702_01_10: I don’t like incomprehensible little kids...
ch0143_00_lambda/2501_0702_02_10:
but I have to admit that when I’m watching
someone that unpredictable, there’s never a
dull moment!
ch0143_00_lambda/2511_0701_01_10:
I can disguise myself as Giovanni perfectly. It’s
his voice that I can’t quite get down...
ch0143_00_lambda/2511_0701_02_10:
I want to give orders to my partner Pokémon, but
without using words.
ch0143_00_lambda/2511_0701_03_10: So, I’m gonna shamelessly beg you to mentor me!
ch0143_00_lambda/2511_0701_04_10: C’mon! You’ve gotta teach me your ways!
ch0143_00_lambda/2511_0702_01_10:
Huh? “The power of bonds”? “Just because”?
“Before I realized it, I was doing it”?!
ch0143_00_lambda/2511_0702_02_10:
*sigh* Well, that’s kids, I guess. They just
DO things.
ch0143_00_lambda/2511_0702_03_10:
Oh well! I guess I’ll just have to rely on an
adult approach...
ch0143_00_lambda/3001_0701_01_10:
You sure are energetic this morning, huh, kid?
I bet Giovanni would like that about you!
ch0143_00_lambda/3003_0701_01_10:
I always disguise myself as someone else when I
eat lunch. Everyone eats in their own unique way,
so it’s good practice!
ch0143_00_lambda/3005_0701_01_10:
Team Rocket’s real work starts when the sun goes
down. Kids like you should hurry up and go to
bed, though!
